page.title: 20CAPENHURST-DOOMSDAY GROUP.
page.content: The Capenhurst Doomsday Group consisted of the children,staff and parents of Capenhurst Church of England(Controlled)Primary School,and members of Capenhurst Womens'Institute Articles were written by the following Mr.B.A.Smith, Mrs.J.White, Mrs.A.Shaw, Mrs.J.Roberts, Mrs.C.Gahan, Mr.I.Shaw, Mrs.S.Taylor, Mr.E.Orriss, Mr M.Powl, Miss.L.Delve, Miss.P.Tripney, Miss.K. Elias, Mr.M.Gahan & Mr.D.Baker. Photographs by permission of British Nuclear Fuels, Mr.J.Hodgkinson and Mr. B.A.Smith. The Amenities Count was conducted by children of the school & local residents. Other information was provided by the above,local farmers and The Central Electricity Generating Board Research Centre.
